metadata.name: LiveKD Driver Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver, which is used for live kernel debugging

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(file.path) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\drivers\\livekdd.sys') AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\livekd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\livek64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver, which is used for live kernel debugging

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of LiveKD for debugging purposes will also trigger this Reference: Internal Research
